recipe_name: Bruschetta with tomato and red onion
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat a griddle pan and rub the bread with olive oil. Place the bread onto the griddle and cook for two minutes on each side, or until toasted. For the topping, place the red onion, tomatoes and olive oil into a bowl and mix well. Add the parsley and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, place the toasted bread on the plate and spoon over the topping.
